PART II – GAZETTE OF THE DEMOCRATIC SOCIALIST REPUBLIC OF SRI LANKA – 18.12.2015
wxl 1"946- 2015 foieïn¾ ui 18 jeks isl=rdod - 2015'12'18
No. 1,946– FRIDAY , DECEMBER, 18, 2015
The Gazette of the Democratic Socialist Republic of Sri Lanka
(Published by Authority)
PART II — LEGAL
(Separate paging is given to each language of every Part in order that it may be filed separately)
PAGE PAGE

Supreme Court Notices ... —
Court of Appeal Notices ... —

Notices in Insolvency Cases ... —
Appointments of Fiscals’ Marshals ... —
Notices of Fiscal’s Sales ... —
Notices in Testamentary Actions ... —
Council of Legal Education Notices ... —
List of Notaries ... 232
Miscellaneous Notices ... 236
217
YS% ,xld m%cd;dka;s%l iudcjd§ ckrcfha .eiÜ m;%h
IMPORTANT  NOTICE  REGARDING  ACCEPTANCE  OF  NOTICES
FOR  PUBLICATION  IN  THE  WEEKLY  “GAZETTE”
ATTENTION is drawn to the Notification appearing in the 1st week of every month, regarding the latest dates and times of accept ance
of Notices for publication in the weekly Gazettes, at the end of every weekly Gazette of Democratic Socialist Republic of Sri Lanka.
All notices to be published in the weekly Gazettes  shall close at 12.00 noon of each Friday, two weeks before the date of
publication. All Government Departments, corporations, Boards, etc. are hereby advised that Notifications fixing closing dates and times
of applications in respect of Post-V acancies, Examinations, Tender Notices and dates and times of Auction Sales, etc. should be  prepared
by giving adequate time both from the date of despatch of notices to Govt. Press and from the date of publication, thereby enab ling those
interested in the contents of such notices to actively and positively participate please note that inquiries and complaints mad e in respect
of corrections pertaining to notification will not be entertained after three months  from the date of publication.
All notices to be published in the weekly Gazettes should reach Government Press two weeks before the date of publication i.e.
Notices for publication in the weekly Gazette of 01st January, 2016,   should reach Government Press on or before 12.00 noon on 18th
December, 2015.
Electronic Transactions Act, No. 19 of 2006 - Section 9
“Where any Act or Enactment provides that any proclamation, rule, regulation, order , by-law, notification or other matter
shall be published in the Gazette, then such requirement shall be deemed to have been satisfied if such rule, regulation, order , by-law,
notification or other matter is published in an electronic form of the Gazette .”
W. A. A. G . FONSEKA,
Government Printer (Acting ).
Department of Govt. Printing,
Colombo 08,
22nd January, 2015.
This Gazette can be downloaded from www. documents. gov.lk

8911/84
MAGISTRATE’S  COURT
DESTRUCTION  OF  CASE  RECORDS  AFTER  CONCLUSION  OF  ACTION,  TRINCOMALEE
THE case records bearing the following case numbers will be destroyed on 11.02.2016 at this court premises, since five (05) yea rs have
been lapsed after conclusion of the cases.
Anyone interested in these cases or those who requires copies or any other documents  in the case records are requested to
tender his/her application for the same to the Registrar of this court before on 10.02.2016
T. SARA VANARAJA,
Magistrate, and Add. District Judge,
Magistrate’s Court Trincomalee.
List of Cases to Destroy Magistrate’s Court
District and Magistrate’s Courts Notices

232  II fldgi - YS% ,xld m%cd;dka;s%l iudcjd§ ckrcfha .eiÜ m;%h - 2015.12.18
PART II – GAZETTE OF THE DEMOCRATIC SOCIALIST REPUBLIC OF SRI LANKA – 18.12.2015
NOTARIES ORDINANCE (APPOINTMENTS)
UNDER Section 30 of the Notaries Ordinance the Hon. Minister of
Home Affairs, has made the following appointments :
1. Mr. K ATUGAMPALAGE CHAMARA ANURADHA JAYASINGHE of No.
80/2, Mihindu Mawatha, Gampaha Road, Ekala, Ja-Ela to be
a Notary Public throghout the judicial Zone of Negombo and
to practice as such in the Sinhala Language.
2. Miss. F ATHIMAS RIZANA IZADEEN of No. 623/8A, "Rajagiriya
Gardens" Nawala Road, Rajagiriya to be a Notary Public
throughout the judicial Zone of Colombo and to practice as
such in the English Language.
3. Mr. M UHANDIRAMAGE THAMIRA LAKMAL RODRIGO of No. 118/1,
Hirana Panadura to be a Notary Public throughout the judicial
Zone of Panadura and to practice as such in the Sinhala
Language.
4. Miss. J
AYASURIYA ARACHCHIGE JUDITH SONALI PERERA of No.
282/4, 5, 6, Dam Street, Colombo 12 to be a Notary Public
throughout the judicial Zone of Colombo and to practice as
such in the English Language.
5. Mr. D
ISSANAYAKES  M UDIYANSELAGE  N IMESH  R ANJAN
GUNATHILAKE of No. 104, Gonagampola Road, Pilapitiya,
Kelaniya to be a Notary Public throughout the judicial Zone
of Gampala and to practice as such in the Sinhala Language.
6. Mr. W EERASINGHE PATHIRAGE GEORGE AMILA PRASANNA of No.
6/A, Middellawita, Ganemulla to be a Notary Public
throughout the Judicial Zone of Gampaha and to practice as
such in the Sinhala Language.
7. Mr. H ERATH MUDIYANSELAGE INDIKA PRADEEP ANANDA of No.
13D, 8th Lane, Hettimulla, Beruwala to be a Notary Public
throughout the judicial Zone of Kalutara and to practice as
such in the Sinhala Language.
8. Miss. M ANGALIKA  S AMARASINGHE  E KANAYAKE  of No.
115/1/A, Andiris Mawatha, Old Kesbewa Road,
Rattanapitiya Boralesgamuwa to be a Notary Public throughot
the judicial Zone of Colombo and to practice as such in the
Sinhala Language.
9. Miss. E
DIRIMUNI  N IRMITHA  S ACHINI S OYSA of No. 137/8,
Araliya Uyana, Malagama, Wadduwa to be a Notary Public
throughout the judicial Zone of Kalutara and to practice as
such in the Sinhala Language.
10. Mrs. M ORADANAGE SHASHIKA NILANI JAYATHILAKE of No. 250/
D/11, Badalgama Road, Wawegodella, Watta, Hunumulla to
be a Notary Public throughout the Judicial Zone of Negombo
and to practice as such in the Sinhala Language.
J. J. RATHNASIRI,
Secretary,
Ministry of Home Affairs.
4 th November 2015,
Colombo 07.
12-677/1
NOTARIES ORDINANCE (APPOINTMENTS)
UNDER Section 03 of the Notaries Ordinance the Hon. Minister of
Home Affairs, has the following appointments :
1. Miss. L IYANA  A RACHCHIGE  A NUSHKA  S HYAMALEE  E RANDI
LIYANAARACHCHI of No. 79, Lenchiya Watta, Ragama to be a
Notary Public throughout the judicial Zone of  Gampaha and to
practice as such in the Sinhala Language.
2. Mr. S UDASINGHE BIYAGAMAGE BUDDIKA WANSARATHNA of No.
436/267, Elvitigala Mawatha, Colombo 05 to be a Notary Public
throughout the judicial Zone of Colombo and to practice as such
in the Sinhala Language.
3. Mr. C YRILGE A SHLEY S AMALIKA of No. 37/2, Sama Place,
Buthgamuwa Road, Rajagiriya to be a Notary Public throughout
the judicial Zone of Colombo and to practice as such in the
Sinhala Language.
4. Mr. D
AHANAKE MUDIYANSELAGE RAVEENDRA JANAKA BANDARA
of No. 52/5, 4th Lane, Walaw Watta, Ibbagamuwa to be a
Notary Public throughout the judicial Zone of Kurunegala and
to practice as such in the Sinhala Language.
5. Mrs. B ETHMAGE PRABANI of "Kalpataru", Kamburugamuwa to
be a Notary Public throughout the judicial Zone of Matara and
to practice as such in the Sinhala Language.
6. Mr. Y URAN THARAKA LIYANAGE of No. 263/7A, Highlevel Road,
Kottawa to be a Notary Public throughout the judicial Zone of
Avissawella and to practice as such in the Sinhala Language.
7. Mr. G URUSINGHE ARACHCHIGE JAYASIRI GURUSINGHE of No. 87/1,
Kantha Govipola, Magoda Ruwan Eliya, Nuwara Eliya to be a
Notary Pulic throughout the judicial Zone Nuwara Eliya and to
practice as such in the Sinhala Language.
8. Miss. S
ASHIKALA  D ILRUKSHI  I GALAWITHANA  of No. 101A,
Dharmapala Mawatha, Pannipitiya to be a Notary Public
throughout the judicial Zone of Colombo and to practice as such
in the Sinhala Language.
9. Miss. H EWAFONSEKAGE SURAKSHIKA ISHANI DE FONSEKA of No.
47, St. Peters Road, Moratuwa to be  a Notary Public throughout
the judicial Zone of Panadura and to practice as such in the
Sinhala Language.
10. Mr. H
APATHGAMA PATHIRANALAGE SUNETH RASANJANA WIMALASIRI
of No. 331, Wanela, Kanthale to be a Notary Public throughout
the judicial Zone of Trincomalee and to practice as such in the
Sinhala Language.
J. J. RATHNASIRI,
Secretary,
Ministry of Home Affairs.
4th November 2015,
Colombo 07.
12-677/2
List of Notaries

233 II fldgi - YS% ,xld m%cd;dka;s%l iudcjd§ ckrcfha .eiÜ m;%h - 2015.12.18
PART II – GAZETTE OF THE DEMOCRATIC SOCIALIST REPUBLIC OF SRI LANKA – 18.12.2015
NOTARIES ORDINANCE (APPOINTMENTS)
UNDER Section 03 of the Notaries Ordinance the Hon. Minister of
Home Affairs, has made the following appointments :-
1. Mrs. M ADILIYA D OMBHAGOLLE  G EDARA, M UDIYANSELAGE
PRAMILA SURANGI NATHAVITHARANA of No. 47/C, Hospital
Road, Dehiwala to be a Notary Public throughout the Judicial
Zone of Colombo and to practice as such in the Sinhala
Language.
2. Mrs. A
TAKALAN  K ORALEGE  S AMANMALI  of No. 120/4,
Horahena Road, Rukmale, Kottawa to be a Notary Public
throughout the Judicial Zone of Avissawella and to practice
as such in the Sinhala Language.
3. Miss. K ALUGAMAGE I MALKA O SHANDI P ERERA of No. 34,
Makola North, Makola to be a Notary Public throughout the
Judicial Zone of Gampaha and to practice as such in the
English Language.
4. Mr. V
ITHANAGE DANUSHKA NUWAN COORAY of No. 153/1
Hakmana Road, Gabada Wediya, Matara to be a Notary
Public throughout the Judicial Zone of Matara and to practice
as such in the Sinhala Language.
5. Miss. J
AYAKODY  M UDIYANSELAGE  S URANDI  M AHESHIKA
KUMARI  J AYAKODY  of Kohumola Waththa, Wellewa,
Ku/Bopitiya to be a Notary Public throughout the Judicial
Zone of Kuliyapitiya and to pratice as such in the Sinhala
Language.
6. Miss. K
OTHALAWALA APPUHAMILLAGE KUMUDUNIE MALKANTHI
KOTHALAWALA of No. 293-A, Bandarawatta, Dompe to be
Notary Public throughout the Judicial Zone of Gampaha
and to practice as such in the Sinhala Lnaguage.
7. Mrs. P ATHTHINIGAMAGE PERERA UPEKSHA PATHTHINIGAMA of
No. 31, Wekotuwa Estate, Hakurukumbura, Mirigama to be
a Notary Public throughout the judicial Zone of Gampaha
and to practice as such in the Sinhala Language.
8. Miss S ASANGA DINULI GUNASEKARA of No. 116/11, Isuru
Uyana, Horana Road, Piliyandala to be a Notary Public
throughout the Judicial Zone of Panadura and to practice as
such in the English Language.
9. Mr. H
ITIGEDARA KAHAWATTA MUDIYANSELAGE KEVIN RAJITHA
of No. 5F 49, Jayawadanagama, Battaramulla to be a Notary
Public throughout the Judicial Zone of Colombo and to
practice as such in the Sinhala Language.
10. Mrs. D EVIKA  T HARANGI  H IRIMUTHUGODA  of No. 25B,
Bandarangoda, Udathuththiripitiya to be a Notary Public
throughout the  Judicial Zone of Gampaha and to practice as
such in the Sinhala Language.
J. J. RATHNASIRI,
Secretary,
Ministry of Home Affairs.
13 November 2015,
Colombo 07.
12-677/3
NOTARIES ORDINANCE (APPOINTMENTS)
UNDER Section 03 of the Notaries Ordinance the Hon. Minister of
Home Affairs, has made the following appointments :
1. Mr. N AGENDRAN PARTHIPAN of K. K. S. Road, Mallakam, Jaffna

and to practice as such in the Tamil Language.

12-679/4
Miscellaneous Notices
AN ACT TO INCORPORATE  THE  SETH SADA
YOGA NIKETHANAYE  KARYA  BARAYA
I, S. C. Muthukumarana do hereby give notice under Standing Order
No. 48 of the Standing Order of the Parliament of the Democratic
Socialist Republic of Sri Lanka that I Propose in introduce in
Parliament a Bill entitled "An Act to incorporate the Seth Sada Yoga
Nikethanaye Karya Baraya.
The aim of the Bill is to incorporate the said Association which has
the following General Objects :-
1. To expend branches to provide training for mediation/Yoga ;
2. To provides aids to Tsunami/Flood Victims :
3. To provide training for mediation/Yoga for Sri Lanka Police
Department,
etc.
S. C. M
UTHUKUMARANA,
Member of Parliament.
12-614
PRINTED  AT  THE  DEPARTMENT  OF  GOVERNMENT  PRINTING,  SRI  LANKA.
